channel.title: The Shyster Club
channel.description: Insurance For Your Affairs - The adventures and stories of the club that helps you cheat.
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Shyster Club - Stories and adventures of the club that helps you cheat.
channel.itunes:summary: In these desperate times, only one club is there to help the married man find his escape from the pains of a dull marriage. These are the adventures of the Shyster Club and the determined women seeking to stop them at all costs.
channel.itunes:author: Desktopepics Entertainment

image.title: The Shyster Club
image.description: Weekly Podcast about an Organization That Helps You Cheat

item.title: Episode Three - Revealing's
item.description: Gary gets a call from his wife, Gretta, at work who is trying to get closer to her husband. Tanya Slate investigates deeper into the Shyster Club and plays psychological games with two potential members ... a client of hers and Judge Fowler.
item.author: info@desktopepics.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Shyster Club - Episode 3
item.itunes:summary: Gary gets a call from his wife, Gretta, at work who is trying to get closer to her husband. Tanya Slate investigates deeper into the Shyster Club and plays psychological games with two potential members ... a client of hers and Judge Fowler.
item.itunes:author: Desktopepics Entertainment

item.title: Episode Two - A Little Religion
item.description: Victoria Rutherford, of the highest ranking executives of the Shyster Club, arrives in New York. Gretta confronts a very flirtatious office co-worker. Gary meets his first interview to join the club ... a godfatherly-fixit man named The Carpenter. This episode also introduces Laurie Booker, phone operator looking for a better relationship and Kelly's Wife, Sheila, who recently became a member of the workforce.
item.author: info@desktopepics.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Shyster Club - Episode 2
item.itunes:summary: Victoria Rutherford, of the highest ranking executives of the Shyster Club, arrives in New York. Gretta confronts a very flirtatious office co-worker. Gary meets his first interview to join the club ... a godfatherly-fixit man named The Carpenter. item.title: Episode One - We All Have Secrets
item.description: Gary Davidson returns home late with poor excuses to tell his wife until his best friend appears to bail him out of trouble. Tanya Slate, divorce attorney, suspects a Judge and opposing lawyer part of secret organization that may have 'fixed' her clients loss in court.
item.author: info@desktopepics.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Shyster Club - Episode 1
item.itunes:summary: Gary Davidson returns home late with poor excuses to tell his wife until his best friend appears to bail him out of trouble. Tanya Slate, divorce attorney, suspects a Judge and opposing lawyer part of secret organization that may have 'fixed' her clients loss in court.

item.title: The Shyster Club Preview - A helping hand for Illicit Affairs.
item.description: The Shyster Club - A secret organization of growing members created for the sole intention of assisting discrete relationships remain discrete ... and the powerful women's committee and religious groups determined to shut down a club no one says exists.
item.author: info@desktopepics.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Shyster Club - Preview Episode
